metadata.title: CVE-2020-25427 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.description: A Null pointer dereference vulnerability exits in MP4Box - GPAC version 0.8.0-rev177-g51a8ef874-master via the gf_isom_get_track_id function, which causes a denial of service.

criterions.comment: gpac package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
